column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Brittany - Thank you very much for the 5-star review! We appreciate your kind words and are especially pleased to know you have dined with us on multiple occasions. In our industry
column2: having regular customers is a strong indication that what we are doing is correct
column3: though we are also always looking to improve! Thank you again
column5: and we look forward to serving you (and your Handsome & Handsome's brother) again soon!
